en-US.summary:
State Path is a fun way to use your knowledge of U.S. states to play a game.  Choose to play either "coast to coast" or "bigger pop". 
Enjoy!
en-US.name: State Path
en-US.description:
State Path is a fun way to use your knowledge of U.S. states to play a game.  Choose to play either "coast to coast" or "bigger pop".
When you start "coast to coast", your goal is to travel from the east coast to the west coast of the United States, by naming a path that moves from state to bordering state.  
The "bigger pop" game also requires you to make a trail through bordering states, however each new state must have a bigger population than the previous state.  Hint: It may help to look at a map as you play.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
There are two games you can play:
 - coast to coast
 - bigger pop

Once you start the game, you just say the name of a US state and repeat, according to the instructions heard at the launch of the game.

Thank you COPS team for the valuable feedback.  I have fixed the three flagged issues.  Please can you re-test?  :) @mccaul
